services.title: Blazing-Fast Fiber
services.description: Experience the internet like never before with our pure fiber-optic network, delivering symmetrical speeds for upload and download.

services.title: Advanced Wi-Fi
services.description: Our next-gen routers provide powerful, wall-to-wall Wi-Fi coverage, ensuring a stable connection on all your devices.

services.title: Business Solutions
services.description: Dedicated bandwidth, static IPs, and enterprise-grade solutions to power your business's growth and operations.

services.title: 24/7 Priority Support
services.description: Get expert help whenever you need it. Our local support team is always on standby to ensure you stay connected.

faq.question: What is fiber optic internet?
faq.answer: Fiber optic internet uses thin strands of glass (fiber) to transmit data as pulses of light. This technology allows for significantly faster and more reliable internet speeds compared to traditional cable or DSL.

faq.question: How long does installation take?
faq.answer: Standard installation typically takes between 2-4 hours. Our technician will install the necessary equipment and ensure your connection is running optimally before leaving.

faq.question: Can I use my own router?
faq.answer: Yes, you can use your own router. However, for the best performance and to ensure compatibility with our network, we recommend using the high-performance router provided by SOON.

faq.question: Is there a data cap on your plans?
faq.answer: No. All of our residential and business plans come with unlimited data, so you can stream, work, and play without worrying about overage fees.

faq.question: How do I check if SOON is available at my address?
faq.answer: You can use the 'Check Availability' tool in our Coverage section or contact our sales team directly. We are constantly expanding our network and may be coming to your area soon!

contact.address: Makka Al Mukarama Road, Mogadishu, Somalia
